blog.description:
H A V E T H E C O U R A G E T O E X I S T
welcome to my annoying as hell dannie blog. I want to be yeeted out a window.
also my name is grace.

body:
GUYS HOLY SH**

I had a dream that Dan and Phil came out!! They came out on camera and talked about their relationship!! Phil struggled to say he was Dan’s boyfriend, but it was because he was scared.

Then, at the end DAN PROPOSED DURING THE COMING OUT VIDEO!

Holy sh**

JFJSHWHAJAJA WHAT IF THIS HAPPENS IM SH O O K

blog.name: sky-dnp
blog.title: No art could ever capture your essence

tags: thank you guys so much for changing my life
summary:
I’m genuinely so proud of them. they went out of their way to provide us with a great show and truly gave it their all. 
Dan and...
body:
I’m genuinely so proud of them. they went out of their way to provide us with a great show and truly gave it their all.

Dan and Phil have helped me so much and changed my life. i was seriously struggling when i discovered them a year ago, and i found this amazing community in addition to two new role models in my life. i am so happy for how far they have come and hearing that the happiness they give us also helps them is inspiring.

So thank you Dan and Phil, for giving me everything, and i hope that i can give you a little happiness in return

summary: i find Phil’s confidence and light-heartedness in this moment, for lack of a better word, beautiful. You can see the maturity in...
body: i find Phil’s confidence and light-heartedness in this moment, for lack of a better word, beautiful. You can see the maturity in his actions and words, but he is still so playful. plus this moment doesn’t feel like forced comedy. its just very genuine. plus his little lean and the end, adorable

summary:
I truly am sad Interactive Introverts is over, I geuss I just hate having to let go of something I loved so much.
But I know...
body:
I truly am sad Interactive Introverts is over, I geuss I just hate having to let go of something I loved so much.

But I know that, no matter what, Dan Howell and Phil Lester will be there.

And that’s pretty darn amazing.
